conversations.content: I want to launch a trial for my new Ulcerative Colitis treatment, what are typical eligibility criteria?

_sample.title: The Effect of Infliximab on Sperm Quality

interventions.name: sperm quality test
interventions.description: All participants will undergo sequential sperm quality tests and blood tests

eligibility.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male above the age of 18
* Capable of giving informed consent
* Diagnosed with IBD at least 3 months
* Patients that are going to start a treatment with on of the following groups: 5ASA, Azathioprines, infliximab or ADAlimumab
* Patients that are treated with therapies mentioned in article 4 for at least 3 months

Exclusion Criteria:

* Male younger than 18

_sample.title: "Efficacy and Safety of Infliximab-biosimilar (Inflectra) Compared to Infliximab-innovator (Remicade) in Patients With Inflammatory Bowel Disease in Remission: the SIMILAR Trial"

eligibility.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Patients, male or female, aged above 18 years at time of enrolment will be selected from hospital databases based on appointments for Infliximab infusion as treatment for IBD. Patients are eligible for inclusion if they have an established diagnosis of ulcerative colitis or Crohn's disease, are in clinical remission and are medically treated with Infliximab for at least 12 weeks prior to inclusion.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Patient has an allergy or hypersensitivity to one of the components of infliximab and/or immunoglobulin products, except hypersensitivity reactions which have a positive response to hydrocortisone and thereby are under control.
2. Patient has a current diagnosis with hepatitis B, hepatitis C or an infection with human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)-1 o

content.answer: Identified typical eligibility criteria from recent trials in Ulcerative Colitis.

trials.title: The Effect of Infliximab on Sperm Quality
Efficacy and Safety of Infliximab-biosimilar Compared to Infliximab-innovator in Patients With Inflammatory Bowel Disease in Remission: the SIMILAR Trial
Interest of Propionibacterium Freudenreichii for the Treatment of Mild to Moderate Ulcerative Colitis
A Single Dose, 2-Period, 2-Treatment, 2-Way Crossover Bioequivalency Study of Balsalazide Disodium 750 mg Capsules Under Fasting Conditions
Local and Systemic Immunoprofiling of Patients Diagnosed With Ulcerative Colitis

inclusion: Male or female aged above 18 years at time of enrolment
Diagnosis of ulcerative colitis for at least 6 months
Able to provide signed informed consent
exclusion: Current diagnosis with hepatitis B, C or HIV infections
Severe disease or acute severe colitis
Inability to comply with study-related procedures

conversations.content: How many trials are currently recruiting for the same condition?

content.answer: There are currently 238 recruiting trials for Ulcerative Colitis.
